summary: Lex Sokolin, a former research analyst and the current global co-head of fintech at Consensys, has been paying close attention to Libra and the stablecoin market. He shares his insights with The Scoop.
title: ConsenSys fintech executive dissects Facebook's Libra project, the growth of the stablecoin market, and how fintech and crypto can coexist
content: Episode 18 of Season 2 of The Scoop was recorded remotely with Frank Chaparro and Ryan Todd along with Lex Sokolin, global fintech co-head at Consensys.
